violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer name 'Владимир' collected at 0:09.337. Operator used name immediately at 0:12.597 ('Владимир, вы из какого города звоните?') but never repeated it back with confirmation request ('Верно?'). Customer introduced self and operator moved directly to next question without echo verification.

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting
violations_detected.evidence: Search announced at 1:11.333 ('Давайте сейчас посмотрим сразу'), continued at 1:48.843 ('Сейчас проверяю'), information delivered at 1:55.903 ('Есть нижний кам с кшина кама пятьсот пятая'). No gratitude expressed for customer's waiting time. Pattern '(спасибо|благодарю).*(ожидани|подождал|ждал)' not found within 5s after search completion.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for customer name
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer introduces themselves, must repeat name back and ask 'Верно?' or 'Правильно?' for explicit confirmation. Example: Customer says 'Владимир' → Operator should respond 'Владимир, верно?' and wait for confirmation before proceeding.

coaching_priorities.issue: No gratitude expressed after information search
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After completing database search (even brief ones), thank customer for waiting. Use phrases like 'Спасибо за ожидание' or 'Благодарю, что подождали' within 5 seconds of delivering search results.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name '74 колеса', operator name 'Ирина', and offer to help at 0:03.637. Proper closing with thanks and farewell at 5:29.341

7.2.evidence: Customer name 'Владимир' collected without echo confirmation
7.2.note: Surname 'Ведерников' was properly echoed and confirmed, but first name was not

7.3.evidence: Intro at 3.637s (< 5s), disconnect within 5s after last speech

6.1.evidence: No critical silence >45s, customer did not hang up

9.1.evidence: Primary search 1:11.333-1:55.903 = 44.6s total, falls in acceptable range. Main lookup 1:48.843-1:55.903 = 7.06s
9.1.note: Search duration 44.6s is in 40-45s flag window but no customer hangup occurred, so no violation

9.3.evidence: No thank you for waiting after search completion
9.3.note: Search completed at 1:55.903, no gratitude expressed

3.1.evidence: All customer requests resolved: tire availability checked, price provided, mounting availability confirmed, order placed

3.6.evidence: Operator searched system before providing tire availability and pricing information

5.1.evidence: Complete information provided: address (Шевская, 3М, Екатеринбург), price (16360 руб), order number (96-30-84), pickup date, payment options

10.2.evidence: Information provided per script with logical presentation

10.3.evidence: Used customer name 'Владимир' consistently, maintained conversation control, proper opening and closing

10.6.evidence: Complete and accurate project information delivered including tire specifications, pricing, availability, and order details

2.1.evidence: No call dropout or service refusal

4.1.evidence: Customer was cooperative and polite throughout call
4.1.note: No difficult customer behavior present to assess

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company and operator name
Used customer name consistently throughout the call
Efficient order processing and complete information delivery
Proper surname echo verification ('Ведерников' repeated and confirmed)
Polite and helpful tone maintained throughout
Clear communication of order details, pricing, and next steps
Proactive information about payment options and promotions
Professional closing with thanks and farewell

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps available with millisecond precision, enabling accurate echo method detection. Clear speaker diarization throughout.
